distill.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a liquid such as water or alcohol more pure by heating it so that it becomes a gas and then letting it cool. Drinks such as whisky are made this way
distill.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to remove a chemical substance from a plant, for example by heating or pressing it
distill.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to get the main ideas or facts from a much larger amount of information
distill.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The notes I had brought back were waiting to be distilled into a book.
